name: Escape the Swamp
description:
Welcome to the swamp. Do you have what to takes to escape? Help your frog escape from captivity and bring him back to his homeland!

The swamp is a hostile environment. Leap from lily pad to lily pad, dodge enemies, and collect coins to survive. Spend coins as you go to unlock new areas or purchase upgrades that will help you escape.

Features:
- One, simple, "single tap" to control your frog. Easy to learn, challenging to master.
- Progress day or night, the time updates live.
- In-game currency. Collect coins as you go to unlock new areas or purchase upgrades that will help you escape.
- Butter smooth full screen 60 frames per second gameplay.
- Optimized for retina display and iPhone 5.
- One continuous story line with cut scenes.
- Secret bonus level at completion of campaign
- Game center achievements and leader-boards. Compete with your friends or people around the world.
- Language support for English, French, and Korean

Stay updated! Follow @escapetheswamp on twitter for the latest updates!
